#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#define MAXSIZE 10000

using namespace std;

int main() {

	char *s, c;
	int i, count;

	s = new char[ MAXSIZE ];
	
	scanf("%[^\n]s", s );
	scanf("\n%c", &c );

	count = 0;

	for( i = 0;s[ i ];i++ )
		if( s[ i ] == c )
			count++;

	printf("%d\n", count );

	delete s;	
	
	return 0;
}
